tool_description: Get a location's distance from city centre, important POIs, or any other location.
name: Distance
title: Distance

api_list.name: /distance_from_city_centre
api_list.description: Location can be given as lat + lng, geohash, h3 index or an address. The distance is computed only if the location lies within a city boundary. Distance returned in kilometres.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://distance28.p.rapidapi.com/distance_from_city_centre"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "distance28.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

distance_from_city_centre.description: distance in kilometres from the city centre.
